doc:
Colin Hanks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colin_Hanks 0 Colin Lewes Hanks (born Colin Lewes Dillingham; November 24, 1977) is an American actor, director and producer. He is known for starring as characters in films such as Shaun Brumder in Orange County, Preston in King Kong, Oliver in The House Bunny, and Troy Gable in The Great Buck Howard. His television roles include Alex Whitman in Roswell, Hank Jones in Band of Brothers, Travis Marshall in Dexter, officer Gus Grimly in Fargo, Jack Bailey in The Good Guys, and Greg Short in Life in Pieces. He is the eldest son of actor Tom Hanks. In the Talking Tom and Friends animated series, he voices Tom, who is the title character. Colin_Lewes_Hanks ( born Colin_Lewes_Dillingham ; November_24 , 1977 ) is an_American_actor , director_and_producer . He is_known for starring as characters in films such_as Shaun_Brumder in Orange_County , Preston in King_Kong , Oliver in The_House_Bunny , and Troy_Gable in The_Great_Buck_Howard . His_television_roles include Alex_Whitman in Roswell , Hank_Jones in Band of Brothers , Travis_Marshall in Dexter , officer_Gus Grimly in Fargo , Jack_Bailey in The_Good_Guys , and Greg_Short in Life in Pieces . He is the_eldest_son of actor_Tom_Hanks . In the_Talking_Tom_and_Friends_animated_series , he voices Tom , who is the_title_character .
